WorkItem.Description:
I had some items equipped, and chose as optional for optimize. Well, Rawr insisted on they were unavailable.
Attached pic just shows the example of helmet.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Says not available when marked with green diamond

Comments.Message:
This is not a bug.

It really does mean exactly what it says.

You have those items equipped.
You do not have those items available.

The optimizer is used to optimize your gear from what you have available. It's warning you that you have some items equipped that are not marked available, so they won't be considered for optimization.
Hi, in the pic, I have set the green marker for "hood of clouded sight", does not it mean "this is available for optimizer"?
Hi, in the pic, I have set the green marker for "hood of clouded sight", does not it mean "this is available for optimizer"?
Ah, I see. Please attach the character file; we can't investigate without it.
Not sure if this is the solution, but check the  Tools -> Refine types of items listed -> Cloth tickbox.

I have had this problem and found that marking the other armor type available does rectify the problem.   Ideally though, the green diamond should override the armor types selection.   You may not be aiming to have leather gear as a DPS warrioir, but if you have it you may as well use it.
